column1: Figure 2: Out-of-pocket expenditure was driving growth in total healthcare expenditure, in real terms, in 2017
Annual growth rates in health expenditure and the contributions to growth for each financing scheme in 2017 prices, UK, 2013 to 2017

column2:
1. Figures are based on expenditure in 2017 prices, adjusted for inflation.
